content.rendered:
Directed by Sathyan Anthikad.

Written by Sreenivasan.

Cast Fahadh Faasil(Prakashan). Sreenivasan(Gopalji). Nikhila Vimal(Salomi). Devika Sanjay(Tina). Anju Kurian(Shruthi). K.P.A.C. Lalitha(Pauly). Sabitha Anand(Prakashan’s Mother). Jayashankar(Gregory) . Aniyappan(Drunkard). Aparna Das(The girl Bahuleyan wishes to marry). Manjusha(Prakashan’s Sister-in-law). Aishwarya S. Menon(Celina). Aneesh Menon(Bahuleyan). Dileep Munshi(Prakashan’s Brother). Meera Nair(Rachel). Veena Nair(Usha). Al Sabith(Gopalji’s son). M.G. Sasi(Dr. Varghese). Sminu Sijo(Gopalji’s Wife). Malavika Sivadas(Gopalji’s Daughter). Remya Suresh(Salomi’s Mother)

Languages Malayalam. German.

Producers Sethu Mannarkkad.

Production Full Moon Cinema.
